content: crochet star motif designed by missouri makes supplies & abbreviations supplies abbreviations magic_ring magic_ring worsted weight 100% cotton chain chain st s stitch es size j/6 00mm crochet hook slip_stitch slip_stitch scissors repeat - repeat double_crochet double_crochet tapestry needle fptr front post treble_crochet pattern make magic_ring r5 chain 1 double_crochet in same st 1 double_crochet in next 6 sts double_crochet chain 2 double_crochet in next st *1 double_crochet in next 7 sts double_crochet chain 2 double_crochet in next st* repeat from * to * to end r1 chain 1 10 double_crochet in magic_ring r6 chain 1 *1 double_crochet in each st till you reach chain 2 space 3 double_crochet chain 2 3 double_crochet i am considering this a r2 chain 1 2 double_crochet in each st 20 sts fan in chain 2 space* repeat from * to * to end r3 chain 1 double_crochet in same st chain 1 *double_crochet in next st r7 chain 1 * fptr 2 row below double_crochet in next st * repeat chain 1* repeat from * to * to end 20 double_crochet 20 chain 1 from * to * till you reach the last st before the fan spaces you should have 4 fptr * 1 double_crochet in next 3 sts 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in chain 2 space * repeat above till you finish the round r4 chain 1 double_crochet in same st fptr 2 row below see tutorial video for help *double_crochet in double_crochet fptr 2 row below* repeat from * to * to end 40 sts copyright information this design and written pattern is the intellectual property of marissa arnold of missouri makes and is copyrighted © 2021 you may print this pattern as needed for your own personal use only you may not reproduce this pattern in part or whole in any form for any other purpose without the express written permission from me by purchasing this pattern you agree not to share this pattern in part or whole in any format - this includes via e-mail written printed photocopied video or copy right verbally to anyone else this includes sharing the pattern for free you also agree not to make any video tutorial s demonstrating information how to make this pattern and upload it to youtube or any other blogs or web pages you agree not to translate this pattern into any other language or convert it into graphs or symbol charts you may however sell what you make from this pattern i do request that you give pattern design credit to me when selling or sharing your work made from this pattern via any online platform by linking to at least one source - my ravelry store and/or my social media pages if you purchased this pattern through a merchant other than missouri makes ravelry store it is an unauthorized and illegal copy please support designers by purchasing legally thank you
